channel.title: Max/Comp Cape:
channel.description:
Well I've been searching for awhile on how to get one of those 2 capes and get the full detail as a download and couldnt find it anywhere. Also I have no clue on how to add it and do all the editing as in color changes, emotes, and etc. So can someone help me out please by somehow giving me a guide on how to do it ?
Please point out what I should do when it comes to server/client folders. Thanks, This might be helpful to others. Merry Xmas To All! :)

item.title: Max/Comp Cape:
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

Is the client one fixed?

And for the source one upload ur item.cfg and il check for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Max/Comp Cape:
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:17, topic:475762”]case 19812:// Item id itemDef.modeid = 65270;// Model id itemDef.name = "Completionist Cape";// Item Name itemDef.description = "For da real bawz";// Item description itemDef.modelZoom = 1385;//Modelzoom (for the inv) itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 24; itemDef.modelRotationX = 279; itemDef.modelRotationY = 948; itemDef.anInt165 = 65297;// Wield male itemDef.anInt200 = 65297;// Wield femal itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";//What it say if you right click the dropped one itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";// What if say if you righ tclick the inv one break;

This must be ur new itemdef

And for the server sided part MAKE SURE THERE AREN’T ANY SPACES IN THE ITEM.CFG.[/quote]

Luna I replaced it with that and it still doesnt go online, any other ways/Ideas?

What do you mean by spaces ? There arent any other the the spaces in between the bonus’s.

Read full topic

This must be ur new itemdef

And for the server sided part MAKE SURE THERE AREN’T ANY SPACES IN THE ITEM.CFG.

Read full topic

item.title: Max/Comp Cape:
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:13, topic:475762”]The server sided is the run.bat error?
Then u prob add a space in the item.cfg

Here is the updated itemdef for ur client:

case 19812:// Item id itemDef.modeID = 65270;// Model id itemDef.name = "Completionist Cape";// Item Name itemDef.description = "For da real bawz";// Item description itemDef.modelZoom = 1385;//Modelzoom (for the inv) itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 24; itemDef.modelRotationX = 279; itemDef.modelRotationY = 948; itemDef.anInt165 = 65297;// Wield male itemDef.anInt200 = 65297;// Wield femal itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";//What it say if you right click the dropped one itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";// What if say if you righ tclick the inv one break;[/quote]

item.title: Max/Comp Cape:
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“luna-scape, post:11, topic:475762”][quote author=Creative I link=topic=593895.msg4189096#msg4189096 date=1356598373]

Il upload for ya in hour
With ints and all. Need i have to convert them for trisidiax aswell for ya?

Yes please, Im running Pvpscapez source, but its based of trisidiax lol. and can you please do a guide step by step if its not to much to ask for? lol

Haha il help ya add my skype: stan.van.der.benf.
I was just going in shower so please w8 i can give you the emote aswell if you like

Cant talk on skype atm : and that would be lovely!
[/quote]

Ok first download these models:

Dropbox

Dropbox - Error

Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

Put the.dat files into ur RAW folder!! (This is located in the cache)

Now open ur itemdef.java and add this case:

case 19812:// Item id itemDef.modeld = 65270;// Model id itemDef.name = "Completionist Cape";// Item Name itemDef.description = "For da real bawz";// Item description itemDef.modelZoom = 1385;//Modelzoom (for the inv) itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 24; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 279; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 948; itemDef.anInt165 = 65297;// Wield male itemDef.anInt200 = 65297;// Wield femal itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";//What it say if you right click the dropped one itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";// What if say if you righ tclick the inv one break;

OK now server sided
go into ur item.cfg
and add this

Now open Itemassistant.java
and search:

you will see soemthing like this:

public String itemType(int item) { if(Item.playerCape(item)) { return "cape"; } if(Item.playerBoots(item)) { return "boots"; } if(Item.playerGloves(item)) { return "gloves"; } if(Item.playerShield(item)) { return "shield"; } if(Item.playerAmulet(item)) { return "amulet"; } if(Item.playerArrows(item)) { return "arrows"; } if(Item.playerRings(item)) { return "ring"; } if(Item.playerHats(item)) { return "hat"; } if(Item.playerLegs(item)) { return "legs"; } if(Item.playerBody(item)) { return "body"; } if (item == 1052) { return "cape"; } if (item == 19141) { return "body"; } if (item == 19142) { return "legs"; } if (item == 19153) { return "hat"; } if (item == 13406) { return "cape"; }

Now add this by the return capes

if (item == 19812) { return "cape"; }

Ok now for the emote (isn’t working 100%)

Open up clickingbuttons.java
search for this:

You will see soemthing like this:

case 154: if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.logoutDelay < 8000) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do skillcape emotes in combat!"); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 7000) { if(c.getPA().wearingCape(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])) { c.stopMovement(); c.gfx0(c.getPA().skillcapeGfx(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); c.startAnimation(c.getPA().skillcapeEmote(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19710) { c.getPA().dungemote(c); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 14046) { c.startAnimation(352); c.gfx0(1600); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be wearing a Skillcape to do this emote."); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

Now add this in:

} else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19812) { int id = 10224+Misc.random(2); c.npcId2 = id; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13152); c.gfx0(2465); c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; return;

It must look like this now:

case 154: if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.logoutDelay < 8000) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do skillcape emotes in combat!"); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 7000) { if(c.getPA().wearingCape(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])) { c.stopMovement(); c.gfx0(c.getPA().skillcapeGfx(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); c.startAnimation(c.getPA().skillcapeEmote(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19710) { c.getPA().dungemote(c); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 14046) { c.startAnimation(352); c.gfx0(1600); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19812) { int id = 10224+Misc.random(2); c.npcId2 = id; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13152); c.gfx0(2465); c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; return; } else { c.sendMessage("You must be wearing a Skillcape to do this emote."); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

Okay this was it.
You probably get some compile error from itemdef.java but post them here and i will fix for you.
Oh and the emote doesn’t work realy good.
But you can see ingame and remove if you want. :D[/quote]

Alright as you said here is the error im getting from itemdef (Client Sided):

This is Sever Sided:

Read full topic

item.title: Max/Comp Cape:
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

[quote=“Creative I, post:10, topic:475762”][quote author=luna-scape link=topic=593895.msg4189075#msg4189075 date=1356597622]

Il upload for ya in hour
With ints and all. Need i have to convert them for trisidiax aswell for ya?

Yes please, Im running Pvpscapez source, but its based of trisidiax lol. and can you please do a guide step by step if its not to much to ask for? lol

Haha il help ya add my skype: stan.van.der.benf.
I was just going in shower so please w8 i can give you the emote aswell if you like
[/quote]

Cant talk on skype atm : and that would be lovely! :)[/quote]

Ok first download these models:

Dropbox

Dropbox - Error

Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily. Never email yourself a file again!

Put the.dat files into ur RAW folder!! (This is located in the cache)

Now open ur itemdef.java and add this case:

case 19812:// Item id itemDef.modeld = 65270;// Model id itemDef.name = "Completionist Cape";// Item Name itemDef.description = "For da real bawz";// Item description itemDef.modelZoom = 1385;//Modelzoom (for the inv) itemDef.modelOffset1 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 24; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 279; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 948; itemDef.anInt165 = 65297;// Wield male itemDef.anInt200 = 65297;// Wield femal itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take";//What it say if you right click the dropped one itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Wear";// What if say if you righ tclick the inv one break;

OK now server sided
go into ur item.cfg
and add this

Now open Itemassistant.java
and search:

you will see soemthing like this:

public String itemType(int item) { if(Item.playerCape(item)) { return "cape"; } if(Item.playerBoots(item)) { return "boots"; } if(Item.playerGloves(item)) { return "gloves"; } if(Item.playerShield(item)) { return "shield"; } if(Item.playerAmulet(item)) { return "amulet"; } if(Item.playerArrows(item)) { return "arrows"; } if(Item.playerRings(item)) { return "ring"; } if(Item.playerHats(item)) { return "hat"; } if(Item.playerLegs(item)) { return "legs"; } if(Item.playerBody(item)) { return "body"; } if (item == 1052) { return "cape"; } if (item == 19141) { return "body"; } if (item == 19142) { return "legs"; } if (item == 19153) { return "hat"; } if (item == 13406) { return "cape"; }

Now add this by the return capes

if (item == 19812) { return "cape"; }

Ok now for the emote (isn’t working 100%)

Open up clickingbuttons.java
search for this:

You will see soemthing like this:

case 154: if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.logoutDelay < 8000) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do skillcape emotes in combat!"); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 7000) { if(c.getPA().wearingCape(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])) { c.stopMovement(); c.gfx0(c.getPA().skillcapeGfx(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); c.startAnimation(c.getPA().skillcapeEmote(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19710) { c.getPA().dungemote(c); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 14046) { c.startAnimation(352); c.gfx0(1600); } else { c.sendMessage("You must be wearing a Skillcape to do this emote."); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

Now add this in:

} else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19812) { int id = 10224+Misc.random(2); c.npcId2 = id; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13152); c.gfx0(2465); c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; return;

It must look like this now:

case 154: if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.logoutDelay < 8000) { c.sendMessage("You cannot do skillcape emotes in combat!"); return; } if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastEmote >= 7000) { if(c.getPA().wearingCape(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])) { c.stopMovement(); c.gfx0(c.getPA().skillcapeGfx(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); c.startAnimation(c.getPA().skillcapeEmote(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape])); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19710) { c.getPA().dungemote(c); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 14046) { c.startAnimation(352); c.gfx0(1600); } else if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 19812) { int id = 10224+Misc.random(2); c.npcId2 = id; c.isNpc = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.startAnimation(13152); c.gfx0(2465); c.playerStandIndex = 0x328; return; } else { c.sendMessage("You must be wearing a Skillcape to do this emote."); } c.lastEmote = System.currentTimeMillis(); } break;

Okay this was it.
You probably get some compile error from itemdef.java but post them here and i will fix for you.
Oh and the emote doesn’t work realy good.
But you can see ingame and remove if you want.

Read full topic

item.title: Max/Comp Cape:
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“DeltaMax, post:3, topic:475762”]what cache revision are you using?
and what kind of server? (Delta/PI…)
if you’re using a PI just update your model header and dload the models[/quote]

Well Im running InsidiaX off of TrisidiaX so pretty much its a 317 wit 614’s if im correct, like I have a comp cape, but its a team cape, and doesnt show me wear it or anything and the whole cape it glitched out, any idea on how I can fix that ?

The Web Guy:

I’m not 100% sure, but I’m mostly positive that this belongs in the client help section, or possibly modeling.

Well, I really dont know where this belongs, but I just want help on how to add it and so fort.

Read full topic
